system.effect: Characters can teleport right into an enemy vessel, gain +20 to Command Tests for Hit and Run attacks and don't need to make a Piloting Test. At GM discretion, usually once a session can be used to teleport to or from a vessel or planet in non-combat ways. Can't teleport into void shields.
